foreignData.name: Goldenes Ei
foreignData.text:
Wenn das Goldene Ei ins Spiel kommt, ziehe eine Karte.
{1}, {T}, opfere das Goldene Ei: Erzeuge ein Mana einer beliebigen Farbe.
{2}, {T}, opfere das Goldene Ei: Du erhältst 3 Lebenspunkte dazu.

foreignData.name: Huevo dorado
foreignData.text:
Cuando el Huevo dorado entre al campo de batalla, roba una carta.
{1}, {T}, sacrificar el Huevo dorado: Agrega un maná de cualquier color.
{2}, {T}, sacrificar el Huevo dorado: Ganas 3 vidas.

foreignData.name: Œuf d'or
foreignData.text:
Quand l'Œuf d'or arrive sur le champ de bataille, piochez une carte.
{1}, {T}, sacrifiez l'Œuf d'or : Ajoutez un mana de la couleur de votre choix.
{2}, {T}, sacrifiez l'Œuf d'or : Vous gagnez 3 points de vie.

foreignData.name: Uovo d'Oro
foreignData.text:
Quando l'Uovo d'Oro entra nel campo di battaglia, pesca una carta.
{1}, {T}, Sacrifica l'Uovo d'Oro: Aggiungi un mana di un qualsiasi colore.
{2}, {T}, Sacrifica l'Uovo d'Oro: Guadagni 3 punti vita.

foreignData.name: 黄金の卵
foreignData.text:
黄金の卵が戦場に出たとき、カードを１枚引く。
{1}, {T}, 黄金の卵を生け贄に捧げる：好きな色１色のマナ１点を加える。
{2}, {T}, 黄金の卵を生け贄に捧げる：あなたは３点のライフを得る。
foreignData.type: アーティファクト — 食物

foreignData.name: 황금 달걀
foreignData.text:
황금 달걀이 전장에 들어올 때, 카드 한 장을 뽑는다.
{1}, {T}, 황금 달걀을 희생한다: 원하는 색의 마나 한 개를 추가한다.
{2}, {T}, 황금 달걀을 희생한다: 당신은 생명 3점을 얻는다.

foreignData.name: Ovo de Ouro
foreignData.text:
Quando Ovo de Ouro entrar no campo de batalha, compre um card.
{1}, {T}, sacrifique Ovo de Ouro: Adicione um mana de qualquer cor.
{2}, {T}, sacrifique Ovo de Ouro: Você ganha 3 pontos de vida.

foreignData.name: Золотое Яйцо
foreignData.text:
Когда Золотое Яйцо выходит на поле битвы, возьмите карту.
{1}, {T}, пожертвуйте Золотое Яйцо: добавьте одну ману любого цвета.
{2}, {T}, пожертвуйте Золотое Яйцо: вы получаете 3 жизни.

foreignData.name: 金蛋
foreignData.text:
当金蛋进战场时，抓一张牌。
{1}，{T}，牺牲金蛋：加一点任意颜色的法术力。
{2}，{T}，牺牲金蛋：你获得3点生命。

foreignData.name: 金蛋
foreignData.text:
當金蛋進戰場時，抽一張牌。
{1}，{T}，犧牲金蛋：加一點任意顏色的魔法力。
{2}，{T}，犧牲金蛋：你獲得3點生命。

name: Golden Egg
originalText:
When Golden Egg enters the battlefield, draw a card.
{1}, {T}, Sacrifice Golden Egg: Add one mana of any color.
{2}, {T}, Sacrifice Golden Egg: You gain 3 life.

rulings.text: If an effect refers to a Food, it means any Food artifact, not just a Food artifact token. For example, you can sacrifice Gingerbrute to activate the last ability of Tempting Witch.
Food is an artifact type. Even though it appears on some creatures (such as Gingerbrute), it's never a creature type.
You can't sacrifice a Food token to pay multiple costs. For example, you can't sacrifice a Food token to activate its own ability and also to activate the ability of Tempting Witch.
Whatever you do, don't eat the delicious cards.

text:

{2}, {T}, Sacrifice Golden Egg: You gain 3 life.
